channel.title: This is Ridiculous
channel.description:
Okay, I noticed you can't drag the two barrels in the antechamber in to the test chamber. But IN the test chamber there is a stool that you can pick up.
So I threw the stool in to the test beam.
And I didn't get an achievement called "Stool Sample".
I'm furious. Sort it out.

item.title: This is Ridiculous
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
+1 support. When I came to this part I expected much of the same, and when it was denied I was absolutely outraged. devs pls fix

Read full topic

item.title: This is Ridiculous
item.dc:creator: Streaksy
item.description:
Okay, I noticed you can’t drag the two barrels in the antechamber in to the test chamber. But IN the test chamber there is a stool that you can pick up.

So I threw the stool in to the test beam.

And I didn’t get an achievement called “Stool Sample”.

I’m furious. Sort it out.
